reviewText:
Dear dedan-deor's staff
  It is important message, I would like to order the DVD of <<Vagnova Ballet Academy-Character Dance Class
Yelena Sherstnieva>> to China,But I can not enter Chinese address in Amazon,so I would like to give Amazon my adress by chineseIn addition to English addresses on AmazonCould you Please indicate and note on my parcel,Or it is a good way of the screenshot pasted on the parcel,that is OK?
I thought it was going to be more instructional and break down the steps.  IF you want to watch a graduating class perform character dances then this is a entertaining video to watch not to learn.

As a former Professional Ballet Dancer, I always enjoyed dancing the Character dances in the biggest Russian Ballets, for one the style in which must be danced and presented, the carriage of shoulder, arms, hands, head, the different usage of the epaulement. Even more important the energy, projection and footwork that is used. This DVD shows you all  that I mentioned above and more. It is the soul, the spirit, that this DVD it takes you breath away.
Fabulous.
